channel.title: Deleting Welcome Screen?!?

item.title: Deleting Welcome Screen?!?
item.dc:creator: @travisabbott travisabbott
item.description:
@travisabbott wrote:

Hey i went into client files and opened up the notepad “Class9”

i deleted this section because it all started with welcome screen…

public static void welcomescreen(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intwelcomescreen = addDTab(16800); intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240 = new int[18]; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241 = new int[18]; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272 = new int[18]; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[0] = 16801; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //Main sprite addActionButton(16801, 0, 0, "Button Text", "mainframe"); addSprite(16801, 0, 0, "mainframe"); //Control 16802 (0) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[1] = 16802; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[1] = 282; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[1] = 101; //Label addText(16802, "30", wid, 0, 0xFFFF00); //Control 16803 (1) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[2] = 16803; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[2] = 344; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[2] = 239; //Label addText(16803, "", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 16804 (2) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[3] = 16804; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[3] = 387; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[3] = 113; //Label addText(16804, "a bank pin", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16805 (3) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[4] = 16805; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[4] = 177; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[4] = 285; //Close button addCloseButton(16805, "sm_welcome1", 170, 26, "Close"); //Control 16806 (4) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[5] = 16806; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[5] = 140; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[5] = 235; //Label addText(16806, "", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 16807 (5) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[6] = 16807; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[6] = 152; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[6] = 218; //Label addText(16807, "Message Of The Week:", wid, 1, 0x800040); //Control 16808 (6) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[7] = 16808; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[7] = 140; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[7] = 253; //Label addText(16808, "lool", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 16809 (7) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[8] = 16809; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[8] = 81; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[8] = 218; //Image addActionButton(16809, 0, 0, "Button Text", "glava"); intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[10] = 348; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[10] = 220; //Label addText(16811, "You last logged in", wid, 0, 0x000000); //Control 16812 (10) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[11] = 16812; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[11] = 203; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[11] = 149; //Label addText(16812, " Thank You For Joining", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16813 (11) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[12] = 16813; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[12] = 241; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[12] = 167; //Label addText(16813, "Pk Planet!", wid, 1, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16814 (12) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[13] = 16814; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[14] = 388; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[14] = 173; //Label addText(16815, "13.10.09", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16816 (14) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[15] = 16816; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[15] = 83; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[15] = 160; //Label addText(16816, "no messages", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16817 (15) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[16] = 16817; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[16] = 68; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[16] = 123; //Label addText(16817, "0 unread messages", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16818 (16) intwelcomescreen.anIntArray240[17] = 16818; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray241[17] = 138; intwelcomescreen.anIntArray272[17] = 100; //Label addText(16818, "0", wid, 0, 0xFFFF00); //Added 17 controls. }

i then compiled and openped up server but it was still there…

Please help me i want to delete it
THANK YOU!
